question: [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: FullnodeNodeConfig::new()] [Directory Creation] Does create_dir_all() set proper permissions preventing other users from accessing fullnode data directories? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: FullnodeNodeConfig::new()] [Path Traversal] Can malicious 'name' parameters cause directory creation outside config_dir through path traversal? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: FullnodeNodeConfig::insert_genesis()] [File Write Race] Between File::create() and write_all(), can an attacker replace the file descriptor causing genesis to be written to a different location? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: FullnodeNodeConfig::insert_genesis()] [Serialization Failure] If bcs::to_bytes() fails, is the partially created genesis.blob file cleaned up, or does it remain causing future deserialization errors? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: FullnodeNodeConfig::insert_genesis()] [Genesis Clone Cost] Does cloning genesis consume excessive memory for large genesis transactions when setting up many fullnodes? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: FullnodeNodeConfig::insert_genesis()] [File Permissions] Does File::create() create genesis.blob with restrictive permissions, or can other users read/modify the genesis file? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: FullnodeNodeConfig::set_identity()] [Panic on VFN] Does panic!() on VFN networks cause the entire genesis process to abort, potentially leaving other fullnodes in inconsistent states? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: FullnodeNodeConfig::set_identity()] [Network Config Unwrap] Can unwrap() on finding NetworkId::Public panic if public network is missing, aborting fullnode setup? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: FullnodeNodeConfig::set_identity()] [Identity Overwrite] Does set_identity_for_network() check if identity already exists before generating new keys, potentially overwriting existing identities? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: FullnodeNodeConfig::attach_to_validator()] [Role Validation] Is validator_config.base.role verified to be Validator, or can non-validator configs be used causing incorrect seed configuration? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: FullnodeNodeConfig::attach_to_validator()] [Identity Clone Security] Does cloning public_network.identity share private keys between validator and VFN, creating security risks if VFN is compromised? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: FullnodeNodeConfig::attach_to_validator()] [Listen Address Clone] Does cloning listen_address cause both validator and VFN to bind to the same port, creating network conflicts? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: FullnodeNodeConfig::attach_to_validator()] [VFN Network Expectation] Do expect() calls on finding VFN networks cause panics if network configuration is non-standard, aborting genesis setup? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: FullnodeNodeConfig::attach_to_validator()] [Seed Trust] Does build_seed_for_network() properly validate PeerRole::Validator, or can seeds be configured to trust non-validator peers? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: FullnodeNodeConfig::attach_to_validator()] [Network Identity Override] Does set_identity_for_network() for VFN override any existing identity, potentially breaking pre-configured VFN identities? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: set_identity_for_network()] [Identity Validation] Does the function validate that Identity::None is the expected state, or can it accidentally override existing Identity::from_config() or Identity::from_file() identities? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: set_identity_for_network()] [Weak Key Generation] Does KeyGen::from_os_rng() use cryptographically secure randomness for x25519 private keys, or can predictable keys be generated allowing network impersonation? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: set_identity_for_network()] [Peer ID Collision] Can from_identity_public_key() generate duplicate peer_ids across different nodes, causing network routing failures? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: set_identity_for_network()] [Key Storage] Does Identity::from_config() properly secure the private key in memory, or can keys be extracted through memory dumps? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: read_yaml()] [YAML Bomb] Can malicious YAML files with deeply nested structures or billion laughs attack patterns cause excessive memory consumption during deserialization? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: read_yaml()] [Arbitrary Code Execution] Does serde_yaml deserialization execute arbitrary code from malicious YAML files, allowing attackers to compromise validator nodes? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: read_yaml()] [File Size Limit] Is there a limit on YAML file size before read_to_string(), or can attackers create multi-gigabyte files causing OOM during deserialization? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: read_yaml()] [Partial Read] If read_to_string() fails partway through, is the partial string deserialized causing corrupted data to be loaded? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: read_yaml()] [Type Confusion] Can serde_yaml deserialize into incorrect types if YAML schema doesn't match expected type T, causing type confusion vulnerabilities? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/builder.rs] [Function: write_yaml()] [Atomic Write Missing] Does File::create() directly overwrite existing files, or use atomic write patterns to prevent corruption if process crashes during write? (Medium)
